CustomField.description: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Résine"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Stellite"))," REMPLACER ","") + IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Résine"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Stellite"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Couronne")), Ligne__r.Liste_des_dents_2__c ,"")
CustomField.formula: IF( Ligne__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "Resine"," REMPLACER ","") + IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Résine"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Stellite"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Couronne")), Ligne__r.Liste_des_dents_2__c ,"")
CustomField.label: Comp2
